alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern St. Charles and north central Lafourche Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Lockport, or 9 miles north of Larose, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Larose, Lockport, Mathews, Des Allemands, Bayou Gauche, Luling and Raceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
